job.title: Principal Digital Signal Processing Software Engineer
job.description: raytheon intelligence and space ris is looking for a principal digital signal processing software engineer in aurora colorado or dulles virginia life with raytheon intelligence and space in this role you will work with an amazing team of engineers that is leading the industry in spaceenabled information command and control systems solutions this position can be located in aurora colorado or dulles virginia relocation assistance is authorized for this position what youll get to do as a principal digital signal processing dsp software engineer you will support a classified signalprocessing program and will engage multiple organizations internal and external to raytheon to develop and implement solutions you will be part of a small multidisciplined highlyfocus team working to develop and maintain signalprocessing applications for use in a realtime operational environment the team contribution is across all phases of systems engineering software development integration and test and metrics principal signal processing software engineer additional key responsibilities a perform signal processing sme role on signal processing programs to ensure architectures satisfy all requirements design develop and implement software solutions for existing signal processing system ability to help with timing and geolocation analysis and algorithms perform signal analysis to support debugging algorithms or creating new algorithms ability to develop strong relationships with customers provide technical support across iis signal processing programs guide and preform development and implementation of the design of advanced new products ability to work across services and support agile practices ability to develop new solutions into the devsecops pipeline and ability to take legacy architecture and help bring into devsecops support new business pursuits and prepare proposals and boes acts independently and proactively seeks to uncover and resolve issues youll bring these qualifications must be a us citizen with an existing top secret sci clearance with current ssbi within last years bachelors degree in computer science engineering math or other relevant technical discipline experience in fields of signal processing software engineering andor architecture of realtime signal processing systems algorithm electrical engineering or mathematics background experience with software process lifecycle including concept of operations requirements system designarchitecting development testing delivery and system maintenance experience with simulation modeling of signal processing algorithms using matlab or similar tools software programming skills in cc java and python strongly desired experience with linux scripting languages bash tch csh perl sh candidate must exhibit an exceptional degree of ingenuity creativity resourcefulness integrity and teaming skills strong written and verbal communication skills as well as interpersonal skills with the ability to interact positively with coworkers and customers in a team environment ability to work in a small team environment high paced with flexibility in job role years of relevant experience in fields of signal processing software engineering andor architecture of realtime signal processing systems it would be great if you also had simulation modeling of signal processing algorithms using matlab or similar tools python git bitbucket or related swcm tools atlassian tool suite jira confluence work with rf sensors software architectures frameworks including containerization netbeans or eclipse ides intel compiler c c fortran mkl experience with geolocation digital signal processing fft tuning modulationdemodulation software architectures frameworks infrastructure experiences software patterns experience with devsecops including jenkins rancher kubernetes experience with centos and linux os what we can offer you a company that is committed to fostering mentorship and career development for their team members ability to work with professionals around the country who thrive in a culture that celebrates the contributions of its employees the ability to continue your career in a challenging and collaborative organization flexible work hours that will allow you to balance qualify work and your personal life benefits medical dental vision life insurance shortterm disability longterm disability k match flexible spending accounts eap education assistance parental leave paid time off and holidays there is a potential for a signon bonus for a candidate with a tssci clearance or higher in compliance with colorados equal pay for equal work act the salary range for this role is to however raytheon technologies considers several factors when extending an offer including but not limited to the role and associated responsibilities a candidates work experience educationtraining and key skills this position requires a us person who is currently has a currentactive tssci clearance weareris engineerjobs engineeringcareers swco rissw scsw dsp raytheon is an equal opportunityaffirmative action employer all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion creed sex sexual orientation gender orientation gender identity national origin disability or protected veteran status
